'''Liam''' is a [[Local Legend]] found east of the [[Weeping Willow of the Lake]], [[Fontaine]].

A treasure map entitled [[Liam's Ballad]] can be found in a [[Huge Shell]], and leads to his hidden treasure.

==Abilities==
{{Enemy Attacks
|name_1      = Elemental Mastery
|desc_1      = Liam has '''650''' [[Elemental Mastery]]. He will:
* Deal '''~392.45%''' increased DMG through [[Transformative Reactions]]
* Deal '''~88.146%''' increased DMG on attacks that trigger [[Amplifying Reactions]]
* Receive '''~175.676%''' increased [[Additive Base DMG Bonus]] from [[Aggravate]]

|name_2      = Electro Molotov
|desc_2      = Throws a bottle of Electro potion at the player's location. The shattered potion leaves behind elemental residue of its contents, dealing '''80% ATK''' as {{Color|Electro DMG}} on impact and '''6% ATK''' as {{Color|Electro DoT}} until it dissipates.

|name_3      = Pyro Molotov
|desc_3      = Throws a bottle of Pyro potion at the player's location. The shattered potion leaves behind elemental residue of its contents, dealing '''80% ATK''' as {{Color|Pyro DMG}} on impact and '''6% ATK''' as {{Color|Pyro DoT}} until it dissipates.

|name_4      = Shockmine Scatter
|desc_4      = Throws 6 bottles of Electro potion into the air which land in a circle and explode after a period of time, each dealing '''80% ATK''' as {{Color|Electro DMG}}. The potion bottles are {{Electro}} objects and will be immediately destroyed upon reacting with another element.

|name_5      = Inferno Impact
|desc_5      = Throws a single bottle of Pyro potion into the air which land at the player's location, dealing '''100% ATK''' as {{Color|Pyro DMG}} and causing significant knockback. The shattered potion leaves behind elemental residue of its contents, dealing '''6% ATK''' as {{Color|Pyro DoT}} until it dissipates. If Liam is caught within the blast radius, he will also be knocked back but will not take DMG.
}}
